item.title: 🚨Thumbnail Editor - Youtube - Long Term🚨 - Upwork
item.description:
READ!

We are searching for a long term Thumbnial editor.
We offer a lot of growth potential within the company so we are looking for someone who is willing to climb up the ladder!

Payment:
You'll get 10$ per thumbnail wich means you earn based on performance.

Adaptability:
We are the owners of multiple Youtube channels, all channels work with different styles, and we also start new channels ones in a while wich requires someone who is willing to learn and invest his/hers own time into learning the craft of a specefic niche.

Availability:
We are looking for someone who is broadly available and does not have another fulltime job on the side.

Are you an A-Player?
We are only looking for A-Players; People with  ambition and motivation to excel. They set high standards for themselves and continually strive for excellence in everything they do.

If you want to grow and excell within our company send us a BLANK proposal with only a link to a LOOM Video introducing yourself and speaking about your knowledge on Youtube thumbnials + explaining why you want to work with us.

WANT TO GET HIRED QUICKLY?
Deliver 3 test thumbnials in your cover letter, based on the following 3 channels:
We will not use these thumbnails for anything, you can even put a watermark over it. we just need to see if your able to take over a style.

https://youtube.com/@centraldiscovery34486?si=r7aaEhQyROKQh1dY

https://youtube.com/@beyonddiscoveryofficial?si=XW_k0XeNjOB7M9uV (James’s Webb topic)

https://youtube.com/@matterspace?si=VWF5i9_foQxbgOGa


You NEED to be proficient with and have Midjourney!

I hope to meet you soon, so we can get to the top together.



Budget: $100
Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:12 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Adobe Photoshop
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Product Review Video Creator (Amazon Video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! I am Lradon from Andvids.We are a video production agency from China assisting our clients in finding  content creators to produce unboxing videos. You can not only get free products(beauty,household,outdoor products,children's and pets' toys etc.), but also commissions by doing this in your free time.

Here are some requirements for the shoot:
1. The length of the video is 1-3 minutes, of which 30% of the time is used for explanation, and 70% of the time is used to show the use scenario of the product
2. Shoot in landscape mode (16:9) ，your face need to be shown in video
3. A clean, bright shooting environment
4. Able to introduce products in fluent and clear English
5. Introduce the selling points and functions of the product, and use it in multiple scenarios.
6. Don't mention price, discount
7. In case of emergency, illness, move or vacation, please inform us in advance.
Do not show QR codes of packaging or products in the video, and do not mention personal information

About project time and delivery method
Please complete the shooting and edit within three days after receiving the product.
And name the video in this format: order number + product name + your name, and put the video Upload it to Google Drive, set the link permission to open and send it to me.
I will pay you after I review it.

Most importantly, we need the original video.
About copyright: After you agree to send the video to us, we have the right to use your likeness for promotional purposes, including but not limited to uploading the video to Amazon

Special case treatment：
  However, if you cannot complete the shooting on time after receiving the product, lose contact, do not shoot, you will be responsible for this, the solution is as follows (choose one):
1. Pay for the product.
2. Forward the product to the new address and bear the shipping cost.

Long-term cooperation：
  The first three videos are the experimental list.Of course I'll still give you a commission.
   After that, if the video effect is good and the communication between the two parties is smooth, long-term cooperation can be considered.

If you are interested in this job,feel free to contact me and please send me an introduction video or anything you have shot recently.Look forward to receiving your applications.Thank you!


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 20, 2024 09:04 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Video Production
Skills: Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

item.title: Text-to-Video Asset Creation Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced and innovative Text-to-Video Asset Creation Specialist to produce high-quality video content from text descriptions. This project requires a professional with a strong background in video production, animation, and AI-driven text-to-video technologies.

Key Responsibilities:
Convert provided text descriptions into engaging and visually appealing video assets.
Utilize AI-driven text-to-video tools to streamline the creation process.
Ensure videos are of high quality, with smooth transitions, professional animations, and appropriate background music or sound effects.
Collaborate with our team to understand the specific requirements and vision for each video.
Deliver videos in a format suitable for various platforms, including social media, websites, and presentations.

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Runway Gen-2, AI-Generated Video, Sora, AI Video Generation

Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor for Training Videos with B-Roll Editing Skills - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a skilled video editor to assist with creating a series of training videos. The ideal candidate will have expertise in B-roll editing and the ability to match visuals to an already prepared course narration.

Project Details:

Number of Videos: 15
Minimum Length per Video: 4 minutes
Total Course Duration: Approximately 20 minutes
Responsibilities:

Edit training videos to align with provided narration audio (mp3 files).
Integrate relevant B-roll footage to enhance the video content.
Ensure the visuals are relevant and engaging, matching the tone and content of the narration.
Deliver high-quality videos that meet our standards and project deadlines.

Key Skills Required:

Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Access to a vast library of B-roll footage.
Ability to listen to the lesson narration and select appropriate visuals.
Strong communication skills in English.
Proven track record of delivering projects on time and to a high standard.
Attention to detail and creativity in video presentation.

Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience in editing training or educational videos.
Ability to provide examples of past work similar to this project.
Strong organizational skills to manage multiple videos and deadlines.

How to Apply:

Please submit your application with the following:

A brief introduction about yourself and your experience in video editing.
Examples of previous work, especially any training or educational videos you have edited.
Confirmation of your access to B-roll footage.
Your availability and estimated timeframe for completing this project.
Any additional skills or qualifications that make you a strong fit for this role.

For an idea of the type of work we are looking for, please review this example video: https://youtu.be/UWKqL-yVB8U

You will NOT need to provide graphics, thumbnails or inserts.

We look forward to receiving your application and potentially working with you on this exciting project!


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Country: Thailand
click to apply

item.title: USA Amazon Product introduction video, simple unpacking video, product review video. unboxing video - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, hello,

In the attachment of my job, there are product cases filmed by others, which can be used as a reference. Just shoot videos like they did.
I have many American Amazon products. For sales, I want someone to shoot a simple unpacking video. Products are all kinds of, often updated, sometimes high value products valuable products, sometimes small items in life.

If you have any experience. Or simple editing experience, you can do the job,

Requirements:
   
1,Both men and women. Fluent native English, native English speaker.  American.
2,Have mobile shooting experience, or video shooting experience, understand basic editing, or add subtitles, background sound.
3,The shooting environment can be indoors or outdoors, but it must be bright, not dark.
4,In front of the camera, introduce the product (I will provide the product script, or the advantages of the product).   Praise the product and demonstrate what the product contains, show product details and demonstrate how the product is used.
5,The duration of the video is between two and five minutes.

This position is permanent. I will first send the link of the product to see if you agree to shoot. I will only send the product if you think you can shoot.
Please provide your detailed address and phone number of receiving goods. I will directly send the products to you from Amazon FBA warehouse. After you receive the goods, you can submit the video to me within 10 days. After that, the product is left with you and you don't need to return it.
And according to the condition of the product, I will provide additional remuneration.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Documentary, MP4, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Documentary, MP4, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: China
click to apply

1,Both men and women. Fluent native English, native English speaker.  American.
2,Have mobile shooting experience, or video shooting experience, understand basic editing, or add subtitles, background sound.
3,The shooting environment can be indoors or outdoors, but it must be bright, not dark.
4,In front of the camera, introduce the product (I will provide the product script, or the advantages of the product).   Praise the product and demonstrate what the product contains, show product details and demonstrate how the product is used.
5,The duration of the video is between two and five minutes.

This position is permanent. I will first send the link of the product to see if you agree to shoot. I will only send the product if you think you can shoot.
Please provide your detailed address and phone number of receiving goods. I will directly send the products to you from Amazon FBA warehouse. After you receive the goods, you can submit the video to me within 10 days. After that, the product is left with you and you don't need to return it.
And according to the condition of the product, I will provide additional remuneration.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:41 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Documentary, MP4, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Documentary, MP4, Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro, Video Commercial, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.

item.description:
We have four videos with clips that are edited together to form conversations. We are not sure the subtitles we already have, are totally correct. Therefor, we would like to be sure, that the translation is correct, because we don't speak Spanish our selves. We would therefor need someone 100% fluent in English and Spanish to take a look at it and rewrite the already existing subtitles. Three of the videos are in Galician and one of them in regular Spanish.

item.title: Video Producer for Facebook and Instagram Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Hello fellow Upworkers,

for our Photo AI app (retrolens.ai) we are looking for a skilled video production guru for our Facebook and Instagram Ads. These ads need to attract a target audience of 35-60 (and rather female)


Your Role:
- Ideation:
    - Research current trends
    - Propose ad concepts, with focus on "hooks" to attract users to download the app
- Scriptwriting
- Execution
- Video Editing:
    - Add voiceovers & captions to the video ad.

Down the line we will provide you with feedback to further optimize the videos

Attached are a few example ads we created. We are looking for someone who can do a lot better than this!

Please attach or provide links to your portfolio, specifically highlighting ads and content you have created that resembles the videos from above. Applications without a portfolio will not be considered. Please propose your hourly rate and how much time you will need per video.

We need 4-5 Video ads per week.

We’d love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $16.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Short Video Ad, MOV, MP4, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Ad
Skills: Short Video Ad, MOV, MP4, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Ad

item.title: Video Content Assistant - Copy and Paste Text onto Background Video Template - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Video Content Assistant to help us create engaging videos for our YouTube channel. The main task involves copying and pasting text from a provided document onto a background video template. This is a straightforward job but requires accuracy and a good eye for aesthetics. A finished video sample is attached as reference of what we need.


Responsibilities:

- Copy and paste text from a document onto a background video template.
- Ensure the text is formatted correctly and looks aesthetically pleasing.
- Make minor adjustments to the text placement to maintain visual appeal.
- Export and send the final video in the required format for YouTube.


Requirements:

- Attention to detail and a good eye for design.
- Basic video editing skills (experience with software like Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar is a plus).
- Ability to follow instructions accurately.
- Strong communication skills.
- Reliable internet connection and ability to meet deadlines.


Additional Information:

- This job will likely be ongoing as we regularly post new videos to our YouTube channel.
- Each video will have different text content, so the ability to handle repetitive tasks without losing accuracy is important.
- Our budget is $50 for every hour of content.


How to Apply:

If you are interested in this position, please submit your application with a 1 minute sample of your work. Attached is the video background, audio and text for you to use. There is also a short finished video sample for your reference.

We look forward to seeing your application and potentially working together to create great content for our audience!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 20, 2024 08:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
